mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.transport_no AS "transportNo", a.customer_no AS "customerNo", a.label_no AS "labelNo", a.status AS "status", a.weight AS "weight", a.cubic AS "cubic", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.base_org_id AS "baseOrgId", a.sign_by AS "signBy", a.sign_time AS "signTime", a.sign_remarks AS "signRemarks", a.receipt_by AS "receiptBy", a.receipt_time AS "receiptTime", a.receipt_remarks AS "receiptRemarks", a.owner_code AS "ownerCode", a.line_no AS "lineNo", a.sku_code AS "skuCode", a.qty AS "qty", a.def1 AS "def1", a.def2 AS "def2", a.def3 AS "def3", a.def4 AS "def4", a.def5 AS "def5", a.def6 AS "def6", a.def7 AS "def7", a.def8 AS "def8", a.def9 AS "def9", a.def10 AS "def10"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tm_transport_order_label( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, transport_no, customer_no, label_no, status, weight, cubic, org_id, rec_ver, base_org_id, sign_by, sign_time, sign_remarks, receipt_by, receipt_time, receipt_remarks, owner_code, line_no, sku_code, qty, def1, def2, def3, def4, def5, def6, def7, def8, def9, def10 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{transportNo}, #{customerNo}, #{labelNo}, #{status}, #{weight}, #{cubic}, #{orgId}, #{recVer}, #{baseOrgId}, #{signBy}, #{signTime}, #{signRemarks}, #{receiptBy}, #{receiptTime}, #{receiptRemarks}, #{ownerCode}, #{lineNo}, #{skuCode}, #{qty}, #{def1}, #{def2}, #{def3}, #{def4}, #{def5}, #{def6}, #{def7}, #{def8}, #{def9}, #{def10} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tm_transport_order_label SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, transport_no = #{transportNo}, customer_no = #{customerNo}, label_no = #{labelNo}, status = #{status}, weight = #{weight}, cubic = #{cubic}, org_id = #{orgId}, base_org_id = #{baseOrgId}, sign_by = #{signBy}, sign_time = #{signTime}, sign_remarks = #{signRemarks}, receipt_by = #{receiptBy}, receipt_time = #{receiptTime}, receipt_remarks = #{receiptRemarks}, owner_code = #{ownerCode}, line_no = #{lineNo}, sku_code = #{skuCode}, qty = #{qty}, def1 = #{def1}, def2 = #{def2}, def3 = #{def3}, def4 = #{def4}, def5 = #{def5}, def6 = #{def6}, def7 = #{def7}, def8 = #{def8}, def9 = #{def9}, def10 = #{def10}, rec_ver = rec_ver + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND rec_ver = #{recVer}
mapper.select: SELECT Max(a.label_no) FROM tm_transport_order_label a WHERE a.transport_no = #{transportNo} AND a.org_id = #{orgId}
